Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia: 🔸 Ukraini...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia:🔸 Ukrainian forces have captured Apanasovka, Snagost, and other western areas. Some sources claim Martynovka has been captured as well, however there is no official confirmation.🔸 Russian forces remain in defensive positions, as the reinforcements aren’t enough to halt the Ukrainian offensive.🔸 There was a strike on the Karyzh bridge over the Seim River, which eliminated the last supply line to Russian troops in Korenevo.🗺 @PoliticsGR

Title: 🇷🇺 Putin signs a degree to attract foreigners trying to escape ...
Description: 🇷🇺 Putin signs a degree to attract foreigners trying to escape Western liberal ideals.Under the document, such foreign nationals will have the right to apply for temporary residence in Russia -outside the quota approved by the Russian government and without providing documents confirming their knowledge of the Russian language, Russian history and basic laws-.📝 TASS🗺 @PoliticsGR
